    • Constructor Detail

      • Train

        public Train(java.lang.String dest,
             int h,
             int m,
             int duration,
             int pass,
             int seats,
             int price)
        Constructor of class Train. Constructs a new train. duration should be positive, otherwise it should be set to 0. pass should be positive, otherwise it should be set to 0. pass should be less than seats otherwise it should be set to seats. seats should be positive, otherwise it should be set to 0. price should be positive, otherwise it should be set to 0.
        Parameters:
        dest - the destination of the train
        h - the hour of departure.
        m - the minute of departue.
        duration - the duration of the travel.
        pass - the number of passeners.
        seats - the number of seats in the train.
        price - the price of the travel.

      • Train

        public Train(Train other)
        Copy constructor for Train. Construct a train with the same instance variables as another train.
        Parameters:
        other - The train object from which to construct the new train.

        public boolean addPassengers(int num)
        Add num passengers to the train.
        Parameters:
        num - The number of passengers to add.
        Returns:
        True if the total number of current passengers and num is less or equal to seats.

        public boolean arrivesEarlier(Train other)

        Returns:
        true if the arrival time of this train is earlier than arrival time of the other train.

      • setPassengers

        public void setPassengers(int p)
        updates the number of passengers. p should be positive or zero, otherwise passengers is unchanged. p should be less than seats otherwise it should be set to seats.
        Parameters:
        p - the new number of passengers.
